instance.longDescription: Return routes for the specified RIB for specified VRF for specified node(s).

nodes.description: Examine routes on nodes matching this name or regex

vrfs.description: Examine routes on VRFs matching this name or regex

network.description: Examine routes for networks matching this prefix

protocols.description: Examine routes for protocols matching this name or regex

rib.description: Only return routes from a given protocol RIB
